mapper.select: SELECT t.term_id AS termId, t.category_id AS categoryId, t.term_name AS termName, t.term_define AS termDefine, t.term_example AS termExample, t.term_caution AS termCaution, c.category_name AS categoryName, c.category_color AS categoryColor FROM term t LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY t.term_id DESC

SELECT t.term_id AS termId, t.category_id AS categoryId, t.term_name AS termName, t.term_define AS termDefine, t.term_example AS termExample, t.term_caution AS termCaution, c.category_name AS categoryName, c.category_color AS categoryColor FROM term t LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE t.term_id = #{termId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO term (category_id, term_name, term_define, term_example, term_caution) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{termName}, #{termDefine}, #{termExample}, #{termCaution})
mapper.update: UPDATE term SET category_id = #{categoryId}, term_name = #{termName}, term_define = #{termDefine}, term_example = #{termExample}, term_caution = #{termCaution} WHERE term_id = #{termId}
